title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2317/97 of 21 November 1997 on the country nomenclature for the external trade statistics of the Community and statistics of trade between Member States (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2317/97 of 21 November 1997 on the country nomenclature for the external trade statistics of the Community and statistics of trade between Member States (Text with EEA relevance)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The nomenclature of countries for the external trade statistics of the Community and statistics of trade between Member States is set out in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 20th day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 January 1998.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 November 1997.
For the Commission
Yves-Thibault DE SILGUY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 118, 25. 5. 1995, p. 10.
(2) OJ L 75, 15. 3. 1997, p. 1.
(3) OJ L 128, 21. 5. 1997, p. 1.
ANNEX
COUNTRY NOMENCLATURE FOR THE EXTERNAL TRADE STATISTICS OF THE COMMUNITY AND STATISTICS OF TRADE BETWEEN MEMBER STATES (version valid with effect from 1 January 1998)
